title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; same operations as the Python client (chat, pull, embed, etc.).

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as an LLM and chat model with standard LangChain interfaces.

title: LlamaIndex Ollama integration
summary: Plug-and-play LlamaIndex LLM and embedding drivers for Ollama; enables RAG pipelines backed by local models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; no API keys required, runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI REPL for chatting with Ollama models, written in Node; supports conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: Ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; chat, pull, list, delete and embedding endpoints covered.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative with inline autocomplete.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; ingest PDFs and chat with local Llama 3.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines; pull models and run evaluations reproducibly.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile collection for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.; one-click imports.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN workflows for human-task summarization, classification, etc.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama; synchronous and async APIs plus Nimble package installation.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed client for Ollama with Tokio async runtime and Serde models.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama using std.http; compile-time serialization and cross-platform static builds.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that talks to Ollama; includes session memory, model selector and Docker packaging.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant pane powered by Ollama; can summarize notes and answer vault-wide queries.
